    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static CommandsServer start(java.lang.String agencyId)
        Starts up the CommandsServer so that RMI calls can be used to control the server. This will automatically cause the object to continue to run and serve requests.
        Parameters:
        agencyId -
        Returns:
        the singleton CommandsServer object. Usually does not need to used since the server will be fully running.
